item.title: England - Two Days in London 20240906
item.description: London is a city I might have known about since I was three years old, but I had never been there. For big cities like this, I only knew a few keywords â€“ like the “foggy city,” Big Ben, and London Bridge. This time, I was thrilled to finally have the chance to visit and wander around. However, London has so many places to visit that two days really isn’t enough to see much.
